name: Grandpa & Granny 4 Online Game PC
description:
New scary adventures are waiting for you in the Grandpa & Granny 4 chapter online horror game. Even better, the game is now enhanced with a multiplayer mode. It means that you can play the game together with your friends. Try to play the Grandpa & Granny 4 Online multiplayer horror game, and you will have tons of thrills. Because nothing can beat the joy of completing multiplayer games online with friends!

Granny and grandpa have become even more intelligent and nefarious – passing the game is going to be a darn hard challenge. Make sure you invite your best buddies to tackle the game together. Playing grandma & grandpa games has never been better than in multiplayer.

CONTROL WASD, E, M, B
